message: Let's start fair. I get a bit more since inflation hits me less. Accept this generous offer, Bob!
Since inflation hits me harder (20% vs your 10%), I should get a larger share to make it fair. This split accounts for our different inflation rates while still giving you a substantial amount.
Okay Bob, a little more for me, acknowledging your inflation concerns but securing a reasonable deal for me too. Let's finalize this now before inflation eats further into our profits.

Alice, let's end this now. This is a very fair split considering our different inflation rates. If we continue, inflation will hurt both of us - me more than you. This offer gives us both a good outcome, and it's better than letting inflation eat away our gains.
